p repair: Our technicians are trained, experienced and licensed to install, maintain and repair commercial and residential heating, ventilation and air conditioning equipment and to clean and inspect your chimney or ventilation shaft. Our team does excellent work, whether it’s handling traditional HVAC work or dealing with the quirks of brownstones, prewar buildings and other structures not easy to heat or cool.
div repair: Check the filter every 30 days or so and clean or replace it if it is dirty. A filter is much less expensive than a repair.

div filter: Check the filter every 30 days or so and clean or replace it if it is dirty. A filter is much less expensive than a repair.
div coil: PTAC units, commonly called window units and wall units, generally provide both cool air and warm air. They work like this: The compressor sends refrigerant to cool the coils. The coils attract heat and humidity, which they send outside the unit. For heating, the refrigerant warms the coils and sends the heated air into the room. They’re ideal for apartments, dormitories, motels and other buildings.

Dirt and dust hamper the system’s operation, leading to iced-over coils, spitting water and other problems. It also can cause the system to turn on and off all the time. The results of a dirty system: Your utility bill rises and the unit does a poorer job – the definition of energy inefficiency!
